summary: A fearless woman fights social injustice; creating a sanctuary for abused women and battling a crooked politician.
cast: Madhuri Dixit|Juhi Chawla|Divya Jagdale|Priyanka Bose|Tannishtha Chatterjee|Lata S. Singh|Ashish Bhatt|Ragini Dev|Sudev Nair|Tanvi Rao|Rajeev Saxena|Ankit Anil Sharma
title: Gulaab Gang
